Package org.forgerock.openidm.core

This package contains the core implementation of the OpenIDM bootstrapping implementation.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    PropertyAccessor
    A NAME does ...
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    FrameworkPropertyAccessor
    A FrameworkPropertyAccessor wraps the BundleContext and accesses all Framework properties.
    IdentityServer
    This class defines the core of the Identity Server.
    PropertyUtil  
    ServerConstants
    This class defines a set of constants that may be referenced throughout the Identity Server source.
    ServicePropertyAccessor
    A ServicePropertyAccessor tracks services with ServiceTracker<Map<String, Object>, Map<String, Object>> and gets the Properties.
    SystemPropertyAccessor
    A SystemPropertyAccessor accesses to System properties.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    PropertyUtil.Delimiter  

Package org.forgerock.openidm.core Description

This package contains the core implementation of the OpenIDM bootstrapping implementation.
